dsOverview.title: Canadian Surface Observations, daily 1963jan-1976dec, 95 stations

summary.p: This dataset contains daily surface observations from ninety-five Canadian stations from January 1963 to December 1976.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: CA/EC/MSC > Meteorological Service of Canada, Environment Canada
